title: The Heart Foundation
brief_description: After losing his father to a heart attack when he was young, Andrew Tonkin dedicated his life to researching heart disease. This is his story of his own experiences with the Heart Foundation. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
